summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 17, Denny Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Franklin Avenue and Boylston Avenue North, from Edgar Street to Hamlin Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15601 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
